Purpura ('''[[Purpura/ecchymosis/hematoma SD-089|purpura/ecchymosis/hematoma]]''')

* red or purplish skin lesions
* separated by an interval of healthy skin
* do not disappear with vitro-pressure
* associated with extravasation of blood into the dermis
* variable in appearance: punctiform, "pinhead" (petechial purpura), in the form of linear streaks (vibices) or larger lesions (ecchymotic purpura).

question.question: What is the definition of purpura?
question.option_a: Red or purplish skin lesions that are caused by poor circulation
question.option_b: Red or purplish skin lesions that are separated by an interval of healthy skin and do not disappear with pressure
question.option_c: Red or purplish skin lesions that are caused by an allergic reaction
question.option_d: Red or purplish skin lesions that are caused by a bacterial infection
